Properties.ProtectedString:
--Rescripted by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
ServerControl = Tool:WaitForChild("ServerControl") ClientControl = Tool:WaitForChild("ClientControl")
AnimationTracks = {}
function PlayAnimation(Anim, Speed) if Humanoid and Anim then AnimTrack = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Anim) if not AnimationTracks[Anim.Name] then AnimationTracks[Anim.Name] = nil end if AnimationTracks[Anim.Name] then AnimationTracks[Anim.Name]:Stop() end AnimationTracks[Anim.Name] = AnimTrack if Speed then AnimTrack:AdjustSpeed(Speed) end AnimTrack:Play() return AnimTrack end return nil end
ClientControl.OnClientInvoke = (function(Mode, Value) if Mode == "PlayAnimation" then PlayAnimation(Value.Animation, Value.Speed) elseif Mode == "PlaySound" then Value:Play() end end)
function InvokeServer(Mode, Value) pcall(function() ServerControl:InvokeServer(Mode, Value) end) end
function Equipped(Mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not Player or not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health == 0 then return end Mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() InvokeServer("Button1", true) end) Mouse.Button2Down:connect(function() InvokeServer("Button2", {Down = true, TargetPoint = Mouse.Hit.p}) end) Mouse.Button2Up:connect(function() InvokeServer("Button2", {Down = false, TargetPoint = Mouse.Hit.p}) end) end
function Unequipped() for i, v in pairs(AnimationTracks) do if v then v:Stop() end end AnimationTracks = {} end
Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Rescripted by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle") Mesh = Handle:WaitForChild("Mesh") Shield = Tool:WaitForChild("Shield")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
Damage = 30 StunBonus = 8
Meshes = { Blade = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=92541982", Sword = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=92542050", SwordAndBlade = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=92542016" }
Animations = { ShieldBash = Tool:WaitForChild("ShieldBash"), ShieldWalk = Tool:WaitForChild("ShieldWalk"), Equip = Tool:WaitForChild("Equip"), Slash = Tool:WaitForChild("Slash") }
Sounds = { BashHit = Handle:WaitForChild("BashHit"), BashMiss = Handle:WaitForChild("BashMiss"), PowerUp = Handle:WaitForChild("PowerUp"), Slash = Handle:WaitForChild("Slash"), Sprint = Handle:WaitForChild("Sprint"), SwordDraw = Handle:WaitForChild("SwordDraw"), SwordHit = Handle:WaitForChild("SwordHit") }
StunScript = script:WaitForChild("StunScript")
ShieldWeld = Instance.new("Weld") ShieldWeld.Name = "ShieldWeld" ShieldWeld.Part0 = Shield ShieldWeld.Part1 = Handle ShieldWeld.C0 = CFrame.new(0, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1) ShieldWeld.C1 = CFrame.new(0.400000572, 1.68563652, 0.280401707, 0, 0, -0.99999994, 0.50000912, -0.866020083, 0, -0.866020083, -0.50000912, 0)
UnequippedWeldCopy = ShieldWeld:Clone()
MouseRightDownTime = tick()
BashedPlayers = {} SlashedPlayers = {}
Swinging = false Bashing = false
ServerControl = (Tool:FindFirstChild("ServerControl") or Instance.new("RemoteFunction")) ServerControl.Name = "ServerControl" ServerControl.Parent = Tool
ClientControl = (Tool:FindFirstChild("ClientControl") or Instance.new("RemoteFunction")) ClientControl.Name = "ClientControl" ClientControl.Parent = Tool
ServerControl.OnServerInvoke = (function(player, Mode, Value) if player ~= Player then return end if Mode == "Button1" then Activated() elseif Mode == "Button2" then if Value.Down then MouseRightDownTime = tick() else ShieldBash(Value.TargetPoint) end end end)
function InvokeClient(Mode, Value) pcall(function() ClientControl:InvokeClient(Player, Mode, Value) end) end
function AbleToAttack() return Player and Character and Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent and Humanoid.Health > 0 and Torso and Torso.Parent end
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local Creator_Tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator_Tag.Name = "creator" Creator_Tag.Value = player Debris:AddItem(Creator_Tag, 2) Creator_Tag.Parent = humanoid end
function UntagHumanoid(humanoid) for i, v in pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ObjectValue") and v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
function CreateStunnedGui(player, character) if not player or not character then return end local head = character:FindFirstChild("Head") if not head then return end local bg = Instance.new("BillboardGui") bg.Parent = character.Head bg.Adornee = character.Head bg.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 1, 0) bg.StudsOffset = Vector3.new(0, 2.5, 0)
local frame = Instance.new("Frame") frame.Parent = bg frame.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 1, 0) frame.BackgroundTransparency = 1 frame.BackgroundColor3 = Color3.new(1, 1, 1)
local text = Instance.new("TextLabel") text.Parent = frame text.Position = UDim2.new(0.25, 0, 0.25, 0) text.Size = UDim2.new(0.5, 0, 0.5, 0) text.TextColor3 = Color3.new(1, (39 / 255), (20 / 255)) text.TextStrokeColor3 = Color3.new(1, (225 / 255), (73 / 255)) text.TextStrokeTransparency = 0 text.BackgroundTransparency = 1 text.Text = "Stunned!" text.FontSize = Enum.FontSize.Size18 Debris:AddItem(bg, 2) end
function ShieldBashBlow(Hit) if not Hit or not Hit.Parent or not AbleToAttack() then return end if Bashing then local HitParent = Hit.Parent local humanoid = HitParent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 and HitParent ~= Character and not BashedPlayers[HitParent] then BashedPlayers[HitParent] = true local torso = HitParent:FindFirstChild("Torso") if torso and Torso and Torso.Parent then local bashForce = Instance.new('BodyVelocity') bashForce.maxForce = Vector3.new(1000000, 1000000, 1000000) if Torso.Velocity.magnitude > 0.1 then bashForce.velocity = Torso.Velocity.unit * 100 else bashForce.velocity = (torso.CFrame.p - Torso.CFrame.p).unit * 100 end bashForce.Parent = torso Debris:AddItem(bashForce, 0.07) local ChargeVelocity = Torso:FindFirstChild("ChargeVelocity") if ChargeVelocity then ChargeVelocity:Destroy() Torso.Velocity = Vector3.new() end CreateStunnedGui(Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(HitParent), HitParent) CreateStunnedGui(Player, HitParent) end if not HitParent:FindFirstChild(StunScript.Name) then local stun = StunScript:Clone() stun.Disabled = false stun.Parent = HitParent end InvokeClient("PlaySound", Sounds.BashHit) UntagHumanoid(humanoid) TagHumanoid(humanoid, Player) wait(0.1) if Humanoid then Humanoid.PlatformStand = false end end end end
function SwordAttackBlow(Hit) if not Hit or not Hit.Parent or not AbleToAttack() then return end local HitParent = Hit.Parent if Swinging then local humanoid = HitParent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 and HitParent ~= Character and not SlashedPlayers[HitParent] then SlashedPlayers[HitParent] = true TagHumanoid(humanoid, Player) InvokeClient("PlaySound", Sounds.SwordHit) humanoid:TakeDamage(Damage) if HitParent:FindFirstChild("StunScript") then humanoid:TakeDamage(StunBonus) end end end end
function ShieldBash(TargetPoint) if tick() - MouseRightDownTime > 0.2 then return end if Bashing or (UnequippedWeld and UnequippedWeld.Parent)or not AbleToAttack() then return end Bashing = true BashedPlayers = {} InvokeClient("PlaySound", Sounds.Sprint) if Torso and Torso.Parent then local chargeForce = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") chargeForce.Name = "ChargeVelocity" chargeForce.maxForce = Vector3.new(1000000, 1000000, 1000000) chargeForce.velocity = (TargetPoint * Vector3.new(1, 0, 1) - Torso.CFrame.p * Vector3.new(1, 0, 1)).unit * 150 chargeForce.Parent = Torso Debris:AddItem(chargeForce, 0.15) Torso.CFrame = CFrame.new(Torso.CFrame.p, Torso.CFrame.p + chargeForce.velocity) local gyro = Instance.new("BodyGyro") gyro.Parent = Torso Debris:AddItem(gyro, 0.3) end wait(0.1) InvokeClient("PlayAnimation", {Animation = Animations.ShieldBash, Speed = nil}) InvokeClient("PlaySound", Sounds.BashMiss) wait(1.2) Bashing = false end
function PhaseInBlade() if BladeHolder then return end BladeHolder = Handle:Clone() for i, v in pairs(BladeHolder:GetChildren()) do v:Destroy() end BladeHolder.Name = "Blade" local theMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") theMesh.MeshId = Meshes.Blade theMesh.Parent = BladeHolder theMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=92537877" theMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(0.7,0,0.7) BladeHolder.Parent = Tool local theWeld = Instance.new("Weld") theWeld.Part0 = BladeHolder theWeld.Part1 = Handle theWeld.C0 = CFrame.new() + Vector3.new(0, -0.92, 0.09) theWeld.Parent = BladeHolder InvokeClient("PlaySound", Sounds.PowerUp) Spawn(function() for i = 1, 14 do if BladeHolder and theMesh then theMesh.Scale = theMesh.Scale + Vector3.new(0, 0.05, 0) end wait(0.03) end end) end
function CreateArmWeld() if not AbleToAttack() then return end LeftArm = Character:FindFirstChild("Left Arm") if not LeftArm then return end if not WeldedToArm then WeldedToArm = LeftArm.ChildRemoved:connect(function(Child) if Child.Name == "ArmWeld" then CreateArmWeld() end end) end ArmShieldWeld = Instance.new("Weld") ArmShieldWeld.Name = "ArmWeld" ArmShieldWeld.Part0 = LeftArm ArmShieldWeld.Part1 = Shield ArmShieldWeld.C0 = CFrame.new() * CFrame.Angles(math.rad(-90), math.rad(90), 0) ArmShieldWeld.C1 = CFrame.new() + Vector3.new(0, 0, 0.6) ArmShieldWeld.Parent = LeftArm end
function CreateBackWeld() if Torso and Shield then for i, v in pairs(Torso:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("JointInstance") and v.Name == "BackWeld" then v:Destroy() end end BackWeld = Instance.new("Weld") BackWeld.Name = "BackWeld" BackWeld.Part0 = Torso BackWeld.Part1 = Shield BackWeld.C0 = CFrame.new() * CFrame.Angles(0, math.rad(180), 0) BackWeld.C1 = CFrame.new() + Vector3.new(0, 0, 1.2) BackWeld.Parent = Torso end end
function DestroyRightGrip() local RightArm = Character:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") if RightArm then local RightGrip = RightArm:FindFirstChild("RightGrip") if RightGrip then RightGripCopy = RightGrip:Clone() RightGrip:Destroy() end RightGripRemoval = RightArm.ChildAdded:connect(function(Child) if Child:IsA("JointInstance") and Child.Name == "RightGrip" then RightGripCopy = RightGrip:Clone() Debris:AddItem(RightGrip, 0.1) end end) end end
function Activated() if Swinging or not AbleToAttack() then return end local DontWait = false if UnequippedWeld and UnequippedWeld.Parent then DontWait = true InvokeClient("PlayAnimation", {Animation = Animations.ShieldWalk, Speed = nil}) if UnequippedWeld then UnequippedWeld:Destroy() end for i, v in pairs(Shield:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("JointInstance") and v.Name == "ShieldWeld" then v:Destroy() end end InvokeClient("PlaySound", Sounds.SwordDraw) if BackWeld and BackWeld.Parent then BackWeld:Destroy() end PhaseInBlade() else InvokeClient("PlayAnimation", {Animation = Animations.Slash, Speed = nil}) end CreateArmWeld() if RightGripCopy then local RightArm = Character:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") if RightArm then RightGripCopy.Parent = RightArm end end SlashedPlayers = {} Swinging = true if not DontWait then wait(0.8) end
Swinging = false end
function Equipped(Mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") Torso = Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") if not AbleToAttack() then return end ShieldBlowConnection = Shield.Touched:connect(ShieldBashBlow) SwordBlowConnection = Handle.Touched:connect(SwordAttackBlow) DestroyRightGrip() CreateBackWeld() if UnequippedWeldCopy then if UnequippedWeld then UnequippedWeld:Destroy() end UnequippedWeld = UnequippedWeldCopy:Clone() UnequippedWeld.Parent = Shield end end
function Unequipped() for i, v in pairs({ShieldBlowConnection, SwordBlowConnection, WeldedToArm, RightGripRemoval}) do if v then v:disconnect() end end for i, v in pairs({UnequippedWeld, BladeHolder, BackWeld, ArmShieldWeld, RightGripCopy}) do if v and v.Parent then v:Destroy() end end local RightArm = Character:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") if RightArm then for i, v in pairs(RightArm:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("JointInstance") and v.Name == "RightGrip" then v:Destroy() end end end BladeHolder = nil if Shield then Shield.CanCollide = true end for i, v in pairs({AnimTrack, ShieldWalk}) do if v then v:Stop() end end if not UnequippedWeld.Parent then UnequippedWeld = UnequippedWeldCopy:Clone() end UnequippedWeld.Parent = Shield end
Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Rescripted by Luckymaxer
Character = script.Parent Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
if Character and Humanoid then local OrigSpeed = Humanoid.WalkSpeed humanoid.WalkSpeed = 0 wait(2) Humanoid.WalkSpeed = OrigSpeed end
Debris:AddItem(script, 2)
